title: Introducing: Dalai Lama Renaissance
content:
Now while I praised the modern digital age of bandcamp and soundcloud for finding the wonderfully obscure, it was in the old fashion method of ‘face to face conversation’ that I came across Dalai Lama Renaissance.

Now while that may somewhat taint any reputation I have as a blogger, I am entirely grateful to a bearded Belgian called Claus who put me on to DLR, as friends of his back in his home country.

DLR‘s latest offering, ‘80 BPM‘ is a fantastic composition of laid back electronica, infused with softened vocals that are reminiscent of James Blake. Sparked with subtle moments of percussion and waves of electronic interjections, DLR have created a track that transcends an ethereal level of calm and feels inherently beautiful with every listen.
